short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility for Knack's Builder, by Cortex R&D Inc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kneuron is designed to streamline the Knack's Builder experience. It helps developers work more efficiently through keyboard shortcuts and automatic interface enhancements.
